fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Represent a player each day, if executed as town, they will survive exection. If non-town, they will gain a vote token.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your ability stops working on two successful saves.
- Evil players will learn you are in play, they have one free chance to privately guess you. If correct, they may pick you or a player you saved to instantly die and get cleaned.
